ing: 1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper, or to taste
1/4 teaspoon garlic powder, or to taste
des: "This sauce is amazing on fried rice or even for dipping teriyaki chicken and steak. I call it 'yum yum sauce' (Japanese white steak sauce). Delicious!"
ins: Mix mayonnaise, sugar, vinegar, butter, tomato paste, paprika, cayenne pepper, and garlic powder together in a bowl until smooth; refrigerate until chilled, at least 30 minutes.
